Question:
[嘉祥]: 「ん？　あれ、俺……実家が和菓子屋だとは言ったけど、そんな歴史あるって話はしましたっけ？」
洋菓子を教えてもらうために弟子入りするのに、実家の和菓子屋が老舗だという話は、場違いな気がして避けていたのだが……
[ベニエ]: 「それは……」
[時雨]: 「すみません、兄様！　私が、今朝」
[嘉祥]: 「え？」
[時雨]: 「兄様の状況を知っておいていただく必要がある、と考えまして。差し出がましい真似を……」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、いいんだ。隠してたわけじゃないから」
[ベニエ]: 「ええ……時雨から事情を聞いたのよ」
[嘉祥]: 「そうだったんですね。あっ、余計な話をして、すみません。このラ・ソレイユに伝統があるという話でしたよね」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Hm? Huh? I... did say that my family owned a Japanese pastry shop, but did I ever mention that they had a history?」
I became her apprentice to learn Western pastry making, so I avoided mentioning my parents owning a long-standing Japanese pastry shop to make things simpler...
[Beignet]: 「Well...」
[Shigure]: 「My apologies, Nii-sama! I told her this morning!」
[Kashou]: 「Huh?」
[Shigure]: 「I thought she needed to know about your situation, so I did something rather intrusive...」
[Kashou]: 「No, it's all good. I wasn't trying to keep it a secret.」
[Beignet]: 「Yes... Shigure told me about your situation.」
[Kashou]: 「So, that's how you know. Oh, I'm sorry for cutting you off. You were saying something about the tradition of La Soleil?」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: “Huh? Wait, I said my family owns a traditional Japanese confectionery shop, but I never mentioned it was such an old establishment?”
I had avoided bringing up the fact that my family’s confectionery shop was a long-standing business because it felt out of place when I joined as an apprentice to learn about Western pastries…
[Beignet]: “That is…”
[Shigure]: “Excuse me, Older Brother! I needed to know your situation, because I was…”
[Kashou]: “Huh?”
[Shigure]: “I thought it was important for me to be aware of your circumstances. It’s presumptuous of me…”
[Kashou]: “No, it's alright. I wasn’t hiding anything.”
[Beignet]: “Yes… I heard the story from Shigure.”
[Kashou]: “Oh? That’s right. Oops, sorry for bringing up unnecessary details. You were talking about the traditions at La Soleil, weren’t you?”

[Beignet]: “Yes, back when I was young――”

reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「We married, and I gave birth to a son... For a while, the three of us lived together.」
[Beignet]: 「When we did... my son told me that... my sweets put a smile on everyone's face.」
[Beignet]: 「He told me, 'Mama, you're just like the sun'.」
[Beignet]: 「The reason why I named this shop 'La Soleil' is because of my son's words.」
[Kashou]: 「I see. So that's why...」
It fills me with joy to finally find out the origin behind the name La Soleil.
However, this story doesn't seem to be leading toward a happy ever after.
[Shigure]: 「...You loved your son... You loved your family, yes?」
[Beignet]: 「Yes, that goes without saying.」
[Beignet]: 「However, I was forced to leave Japan.」
[Beignet]: 「My older brother, who was supposed to take over this pâtissièrie, died an early death...」

[Beignet]: “My son told me that ‘Mom is like the sun.’”

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「そんなことがあったなんて……」
[ベニエ]: 「あの頃の私は、まだ若くて、賢明ではなかったわね。いくつものことを追いかけて……」
[ベニエ]: 「失ったあとに、何が一番大切だったのか、気付いたもの」
[フレーズ]: 「家族が……一番だったのですか？」
[ベニエ]: 「そうね……私にとっての、お菓子は……息子が笑顔になってくれるものだった」
[ベニエ]: 「私が作っているお菓子は、幼い息子が美味しいと褒めてくれた味なのよ」
[ベニエ]: 「今も作り続けているのは、いつかまた息子が食べて喜んでくれるかもしれない、と思って」
[ベニエ]: 「……そういう、未練なのよ」
[嘉祥]: 「あの……ご家族は、今は……？」
下宿させてもらって、毎日のように店を手伝っていたが、電話も郵便も、家族らしき者から連絡が来たことはなかった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「I can't believe that's what happened...」
[Beignet]: 「I was still young back then and not wise. I tried chasing after a lot of things...」
[Beignet]: 「After I lost it all, I realized what was truly precious to me.」
[Fraise]: 「Was it... family?」
[Beignet]: 「Yes... To me, my pastries were always... something that brought a smile to my son's face.」
[Beignet]: 「The pastries I make are imbued with the flavor that my young son complimented me for.」
[Beignet]: 「I think that I still make them to this day on the off-chance that my son might eat them in joy one day.」
[Beignet]: 「...That is the regret I speak of.」
[Kashou]: 「Um... Where is your family now...?」
I lodged here with Mentor's permission and helped in the shop each day, but I don't remember a single phone call, package, or message from anyone even resembling family.
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: “You mean something like that happened…? ”
[Beignet]: “Back then, I was still young and not wise, you know. I chased after so many things…”
[Beignet]: “And after losing them, I realized what was most important.”
[Fraise]: “Was it your family… that was the most important?”
[Beignet]: “Yes, well… for me, sweets were… something that made my son smile.”
[Beignet]: “The sweets I make are the taste my little son praised as delicious.”
[Beignet]: “I still continue to make them because maybe someday my son will eat them and be happy again.”
[Beignet]: “...It’s just a lingering regret, you see.”
[Kashou]: “Um… your family now…?”
“I was staying at the boarding house and helping out in the shop every day, but there hadn't been any contact from anyone who resembled my family – not even phone calls or letters.”

Question:
[ベニエ]: 「歳を取ってから、ようやく息子の気持ちを考えることができるようになったなんてね……」
[嘉祥]: 「気持ちを考える……」

[フレーズ]: 「歳なんて関係ないと思います、パティシエール」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は……やっぱり、当時の師匠が、ただ失敗したとは思えません」
[嘉祥]: 「だって、もしも師匠が日本に残って、この街でパティスリーを再開していなかったら、俺は素晴らしい洋菓子に出会えなかった」
[ベニエ]: 「……そういう考え方もあるわね」
[フレーズ]: 「わ、わたしもです！　パティシエールがいなかったら、今頃は……」
[ベニエ]: 「そうね。フレーズには出会えなかったかもしれない」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「To think that I finally managed to consider my son's feelings after growing old...」
[Kashou]: 「Considering his feelings...」
[Shigure]: 「No matter how old I would get, I would want to meet my mother.」
[Fraise]: 「I don't think age matters here, Pâtissière.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I... couldn't consider what you did at the time as a mistake.」
[Kashou]: 「I mean, if you had remained in Japan and hadn't resumed business as a patissiere here, I wouldn't have ever encountered such wonderful Western pastries.」
[Beignet]: 「...I suppose that is one way of thinking about it.」
[Fraise]: 「I-I agree! If you weren't around, Pâtissière, then we wouldn't...」
[Beignet]: 「That's true. We probably wouldn't have ever met.」
ModelAnswer:
[Beignet]: “It’s only now, after getting older, that I can truly understand my son's feelings…”
[Kashou]: “Understand his feelings…”
[Shigure]: “No matter how old I get, I just want to see my mother.”
[Fraise]: “Age doesn’t really matter, patissier.”
[Kashou]: “I… I still don't think my former mentor simply failed.”
[Kashou]: “After all, if he had stayed in Japan and hadn’t reopened a patisserie here, I never would have discovered such wonderful pastries.”
[Beignet]: “...That’s one way to look at it, isn’t it?”
[Fraise]: “W-well, I agree! If there hadn't been a patissier, I might not even be…”
[Beignet]: “Yes, indeed. Perhaps you wouldn’t have met Fraize.”

Question:
[時雨]: 「だって、あんなにも大勢のお客さんが、笑顔になっていたじゃありませんか」
[ベニエ]: 「……ありがたいことにね」
[嘉祥]: 「昔の師匠が失敗したとは思えません。でも、息子さんの気持ちを考えてあげられなかったというのも事実なんだと思います」
[嘉祥]: 「だけど、息子さんが大人になっているなら、師匠の気持ちだって考えてくれるんじゃないか、って」
[ベニエ]: 「それは、私にとって都合のいい空想ではなくて？」
[嘉祥]: 「かもしれません。でも、わからないことです。だから、俺は……息子さんに会ってみるべきだと思います」
[嘉祥]: 「勝手なことを言って、すみません」
[フレーズ]: 「わたしも、お兄さんと同じように思います、パティシエール」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「After all, that huge crowd of people had smiles on each of their faces, did they not?」
[Beignet]: 「...Yes, thankfully.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't think  what you did in the past was a mistake, but I do think it's a fact that you couldn't take your son's feelings into consideration at the time.」
[Kashou]: 「Still, if your son is an adult now, I'm pretty sure that he's considering how you must've felt, too.」
[Beignet]: 「Isn't that just convenient wishful thinking?」
[Kashou]: 「Perhaps, but nothing is certain, which is why... I think you should give your son a visit.」
[Kashou]: 「I apologize for speaking outside my boundaries.」
[Fraise]: 「My opinion is the same as Onii-san's, Pâtissière.」
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: “Didn’t you notice that so many customers were smiling?”
[Beignet]: “...It’s a fortunate thing, I suppose.”
[Kashou]: “I don't believe your old mentor would have made such a mistake. But there was also the fact that I didn’t consider my son’s feelings.”
[Kashou]: “But if my son is growing up, shouldn’t he understand his father’s feelings too?”
[Beignet]: “Isn't that just an ideal I find convenient?”
[Kashou]: “Perhaps. But it’s unknown. That’s why I… think I should visit my son.”
[Kashou]: “I apologize for speaking so rashly.”
[Fraise]: “I feel the same way, older brother. Patissier.”

Question:

師匠は家族と離ればなれになったことを後悔している。
俺は自分から家を出て、両親とは疎遠になっていた。
母親の誕生日に言い争いをしたっきり、一度も連絡すら取っていない。
すでに道を間違えているような気がしなくもないが……
[ベニエ]: 「今の嘉祥には、パティシエとしての実力だけじゃなく、とても大切なものが身についているもの」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「But, I'll try thinking it over again, okay?」
[Kashou]: 「...Forgive me, Mentor. I didn't mean to make you tell such a sad tale.」
[Beignet]: 「No, I had been thinking I should talk about it eventually anyway.」
[Beignet]: 「I know you're on the right path, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Me? On the right path? Well, I'd... certainly like to think so.」
Mentor regrets the fact that she was separated from her family.
I left my house voluntarily and became estranged from my parents.
Ever since that verbal spat I had on my mom's birthday, I haven't gotten in contact with them even once.
I'd say it definitely feels as though I'm on the wrong path, but...
[Beignet]: 「Right now, you have not only mastered the skills of a capable pâtissièr, but something else very important.」
ModelAnswer:

[Kashou]: “...I’m sorry, Mentor. I brought up a sad story.”
[Beignet]: “No… I thought it was important to tell you eventually.”
[Beignet]: “I believe you're going down the wrong path, Kashou.”
[Kashou]: “Me? ...That’s what you think?”
The Mentor regrets being separated from his family.
I left home myself and had become estranged from my parents.
I argued with my mother on her birthday and haven’t even contacted her since.
I have a feeling I'm already going the wrong way…
[Beignet]: “Right now, Kashou has something very precious besides just his pastry skills.”

[嘉祥]: 「そんなに薄情な人間ではなかったと思うぞ。むしろ、お節介なくらいで……」
[時雨]: 「はい。今も昔も、兄様はとっても優しくて、素敵です」
[時雨]: 「でも、以前なら、私の言葉を待つことなく、重そうだから持ってあげるよと言うかと思います」
[嘉祥]: 「そう、かな……？」
[時雨]: 「それはそれで、とても嬉しいことですし、私は感謝したと思いますが」
[時雨]: 「でも、今の兄様は、私に判断を任せてくれました」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Shigure, I can take that for you if it's too much, so just ask before you break your back.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh...」
[Shigure]: 「Nii-sama, I think you've changed a bit...」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? Looking out for my little sister carrying a bunch of heavy luggage isn't something new for me, is it?」
[Kashou]: 「I don't think that I've ever been THAT heartless before. Actually, I just might dote a little too much...」
[Shigure]: 「Yes. Past and present, you've always been a kind and wonderful person.」
[Shigure]: 「But, in the past, I feel as though you wouldn't wait for me to say anything and you would just say, 'Hey, that looks heavy; I'll take that off your hands'.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, would I...?」
[Shigure]: 「That being the case, it's an extremely kind gesture, and I would appreciate it.」
[Shigure]: 「However, you seem to let me make the decision for myself now.」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: “Shigure, I’ll carry anything you need if it’s too heavy, so please tell me before you push yourself.”
[Shigure]: “Ah……”
[Shigure]: “Master, something has changed…”
[Kashou]: “Really? You’ve always worried about your younger sister carrying heavy things, haven’t you?”
[Kashou]: “I didn't think you were such a callous person. Actually, you were incredibly considerate…”
[Shigure]: “Yes. Brother-san is still wonderfully kind and lovely, both now and in the past.”
[Shigure]: “But, previously, you would have immediately offered to carry anything heavy for me without waiting for my words.”
[Kashou]: “I suppose so…?”
[Shigure]: “That was very pleasing to me, and I appreciated it, of course.”
[Shigure]: “But the current Brother-san has given me the freedom to make my own decisions.”

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[時雨]: 「きっと自覚はないのでしょう。ちょっとした変化です。兄様マニアの私でなければ、見逃してしまいますわ」
[嘉祥]: 「お、おう……」
俺自身のことなのに、妹のほうが把握しているというのも、どうかと思うが……
[時雨]: 「ここ数日のことだけでなく……きっと、これまでの日々の積み重ねが、兄様を変えたのでしょうね」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は何も変わったつもりはないけれど、時雨が言うのなら、変わったのかもしれない」
ネコたちと過ごした日々があって、師匠の言葉があって、今の俺が形作られているのだろう。
[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、師匠があれだけの話をしてくれたんだ。俺だって少しは学ぶさ」
[時雨]: 「学びはありましたか？」
[嘉祥]: 「たぶんな。俺も、自分が洋菓子を作る理由を考えてみたよ」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「You probably don't realize it yourself since it's such a minor change. If I weren't such a Nii-sama fanatic, I would have overlooked it myself.」
[Kashou]: 「U-Uh, sure...」
Not sure how I feel about my sister being able to pick up on something about me better than... well, me.
[Shigure]: 「I'm sure that the past few days alone haven't changed you... but rather, the culmination of the days leading up until now have.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't really think I've changed any, but maybe I did if you say so.」
The days I spent with the girls, my mentor's words— all those things have probably helped shape the person I am now.
[Kashou]: 「Well, Mentor was willing to share that much of her story with me. I could learn a thing or two myself.」
[Shigure]: 「Were you able to learn anything?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I think. I tried thinking of my own reasons for pastry-making.」
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: “I’m sure he doesn't realize it. It’s just a small change. If I weren’t a fan of my older brother, I would have missed it.”
[Kashou]: “Oh… uh…”
It’s strange that my sister should be the one to understand this, considering it’s about myself…
[Shigure]: “Not just these past few days… surely, all those everyday moments have changed him, haven't they?”
[Kashou]: “I don’t feel like I’ve changed, but if you say so, Shigure, perhaps I have.”
Because of the time I spent with the cats, and because of my master’s words, that’s how I am now.
[Kashou]: “Well, my master told me such stories. I did learn a little, too.”
[Shigure]: “Did you learn anything?”
[Kashou]: “I think so. I've also been thinking about why I make pastries.”

[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「それが言葉だけだったんじゃないか、と思ってな」
[時雨]: 「そんな！　言葉だけなんてこと……」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、本当の心の奥底にある理由を……俺は自分自身の気持ちを、深く考えてみたんだ」
[嘉祥]: 「結局のところ、俺は……親父に認められたいんだ」
[嘉祥]: 「いい歳して、反抗期なんじゃないか？」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は、承認欲求に満ちたエゴイストなんだろう、きっと」
[嘉祥]: 「すまないな、時雨……幻滅させたかな……？」
[時雨]: 「それが、兄様が洋菓子を作っている理由なんですか？」
[嘉祥]: 「そうじゃなければ、親父に否定されたくらいで、こんなにも悩んだりはしないだろう」
[時雨]: 「もしかしたら、そういう気持ちはあるのかもしれません」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I'm starting to think those were just words.」
[Shigure]: 「No way! No way they're just words...」
[Kashou]: 「No, I mean the real reason deep in my heart... I tried giving my own feelings some deep thought.」
[Kashou]: 「Ultimately, I... just want dad to approve of me.」
[Kashou]: 「A little too old to be going through my rebellious teenager phase, I know.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm pretty sure I'm being egotistical and trying to seek approval.」
[Kashou]: 「Sorry, Shigure. Did I shatter your illusion of me...?」
[Shigure]: 「Is that your reason for making pastries, Nii-sama?」
[Kashou]: 「If it wasn't, I wouldn't be this broken up about dad disapproving of me.」
[Shigure]: 「That could very well play a part in it, yes.」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: “I thought it might have just been words, you know?”
[Shigure]: “Really! Just words…?”
[Kashou]: “No, I really dug deep and considered the reason from the depths of my heart… I even pondered my own feelings.”
[Kashou]: “In the end, I... I want to be recognized by Father.”
[Kashou]: “It’s embarrassing, isn't it? Am I going through a rebellious phase?”
[Kashou]: “I must be a selfish person overflowing with a need for validation, I’m sure of it.”
[Kashou]: “Sorry, Shigure… did I disillusion you…?”
[Shigure]: “That’s… why is it that my brother makes pastries?”
[Kashou]: “Otherwise, I wouldn't have been this troubled if Father had denied me.”
[Shigure]: “Perhaps I do feel that way.”

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「そ、それは……そうだけど……」
[嘉祥]: 「でも、あれこれ命令されて、釈然としない気持ちがあったのは間違いない」
[嘉祥]: 「素直に従う気になれなくて、フランスに留学したんだ」
[時雨]: 「父様に認められたいだけなら、ネコたちを喜ばせるためにケーキを作る必要はなかったと思います」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、それは……」
[時雨]: 「お客さんに認めてもらうために頑張るのは、お店をやっている以上は、当然のことだと思いますが」
[嘉祥]: 「う、む……」
[時雨]: 「兄様は、対抗心だけでお菓子を作っているわけじゃないです。そのことは、私がよく知っています」
[時雨]: 「ネコたちに喜んでもらえたときの、兄様の笑顔……どこに、父様への反抗心があるというのですか？」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「W-Well... That's true, but...」
[Kashou]: 「But I definitely felt frustrated after having him boss me around.」
[Kashou]: 「I couldn't find it in me to comply, so I went to study abroad in France.」
[Shigure]: 「If you just wanted father's approval, then I wouldn't think you'd need to bake cakes to please the girls.」
[Kashou]: 「No, that was just...」
[Shigure]: 「I do think that trying your best for your customer's approval is natural so long as you operate a business.」
[Kashou]: 「Um, yeah...」
[Shigure]: 「But you're not making pastries just to be a rebel. That much I know well.」
[Shigure]: 「The smile on your face when you make the girls happy... What part of that has to do with rebelling against Father?」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: “It… it’s true… but…”
[Kashou]: “But, I was constantly being ordered around, and I couldn't shake the feeling that it wasn’t right.”
[Kashou]: “That’s why I didn’t go to France; I wanted to simply obey.”
[Shigure]: “If I only wanted my father’s approval, I wouldn’t have needed to make cakes to please the cats.”
[Kashou]: “No, that’s…”
[Shigure]: “It's natural for me to work hard to earn customers’ recognition, since I run a shop; but…”
[Kashou]: “U… hmm…”
[Shigure]: “My brother isn’t making sweets out of pure rivalry. I know that very well.”
[Shigure]: “The smile my brother has when the cats enjoy his creations… where is the rebellion against Father?”

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……けっこう遅くなったな」
[時雨]: 「そうですね。夕食には戻れるかと思っていたのですが」
飛行機の到着がやや遅れ、俺たちは夜になって帰宅した。
まだネコたちが店にいるだろうから、と時雨も水無月家ではなく、俺と一緒にラ・ソレイユへ。
[嘉祥]: 「さすがにこの行脚はキツかったな」
しかも、向こうでは立ち仕事が多かった。
[時雨]: 「私は、ぜんぜん大丈夫です。　お気遣いは無用です、兄様」
気丈に笑みを浮かべるが、疲労の色は隠せない。
[嘉祥]: 「ウチで休んでいくといい。　なんなら泊まって、明日帰ってもいいし」
[時雨]: 「お泊まりですか！？」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Phew... It sure got late.」
[Shigure]: 「That it did. I thought that we could make it back in time for dinner.」
My plane landed somewhat late, so I end up home around nighttime.
Figuring that the catgirls would be at the shop, Shigure comes with me to La Soleil instead of the Minaduki house.
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I guess the trek over was asking a lot.」
Plus, we did so much work on our feet overseas.
[Shigure]: 「I'm perfectly fine. You needn't worry about me, Nii-sama.」
Shigure gives a firm smile, but she can't hide her exhaustion.
[Kashou]: 「You can rest up at my house. You can also stay over and go back home tomorrow, if you want.」
[Shigure]: 「Stay over?!」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: “Ugh… it’s quite late.”
[Shigure]: “Yes, it is. I thought we could still make it for dinner.”
The flight arrived a little late, and we returned home as it was already night.
Shigure came with me to La Soleil instead of the Minaduki household, because she thought the cats would still be in the shop.
[Kashou]: “Honestly, this trip was brutal.”
And on top of that, there was a lot of standing work over there.
[Shigure]: “I’m perfectly fine. Please don't worry about me, *Onii-sama*.”
She smiles brightly, but it doesn’t hide her fatigue.
[Kashou]: “Let’s rest at my place. If you like, you can stay the night too. We could even leave tomorrow.”
[Shigure]: “Stay the night?!”

そんなことを話しつつ、俺たちはラ・ソレイユへと戻るのだった。

reference_answer:
That being said, I don't have the leisure to drop her off at home either. I'm going to be super busy starting bright and early tomorrow.
[Shigure]: 「What a turn of events... To think that I would be in the same bed as Nii-sama once more!」
[Kashou]: 「As if. I'd be using the sofa in the living room, so don't worry.」
[Kashou]: 「I used to sleep there whenever Chocola and Vanilla took over my bed, after all.」
Kind of takes me down memory lane.
[Shigure]: 「But that was at the start of spring, right? It's the middle of winter now, Nii-sama.」
[Kashou]: 「Urk... Well, I'll just use my coat as a blanket.」
[Shigure]: 「I would rather you not catch a cold, Nii-sama.」
As we share a back-and-forth, the two of us head in to La Soleil.
[Kashou]: 「Hey, we're back.」
ModelAnswer:
Chocola: “I don’t have the leeway to send you off, either. I’ve got a busy day ahead of me tomorrow too.”
Shigure: "What an unbelievable thing… to be in the same bed as my brother…"
Kashou: “Don't be ridiculous. I’ll use the sofa in the living room, so it’s fine.”
Kashou: “I used to sleep on the bed when you guys took it for yourselves too, you know?”
That’s a little nostalgic.
Shigure: "That was during springtime, wasn't it? It’s deep winter now, brother."
Kashou: “Ugh… well, I’ll use my coat as a blanket.”
Shigure: “I wouldn’t want you to catch a cold from me.”
And so, we returned to La Soleil while talking about such things.
Kashou: "I'm home."

[Kashou]: 「I was only chasing after 'a flavor to put smiles on everyone's faces'.」
I thought that if I could replicate my mentor's flavor, then I could put smiles on faces.

[Kashou]: “That’s just chasing after the taste that makes people happy.”
If I could recreate my master's flavor, I thought I could make everyone happy.
[Maple]: “Huh? Aren’t those different things?”

[Chocola]: “Are you alright, Master?”

[character] Name: Minaduki Awayuki (水無月 淡雪) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
今夜のクリスマス・パーティーのために作ったケーキだ。
父親は何と言うだろうか？
俺は不思議な高揚感に包まれていた。
[一同]: 「メリー・クリスマスにゃ！メリ……クリメリー・クリスマスーメリー・クリスマス♪メリー・クリスマスです～♪メリー・クリスマスッ！！メリー・クリスマス」
[淡雪]: 「めりーくりすます」
[嘉祥]: 「って……親父は、どこいった？」
まさか、今回は顔を合わすこともしないつもりか？
[淡雪]: 「ふふ……心配しなくても、ちょっとしたら帰ってくるわ」
[淡雪]: 「町内会の呑み会に、差し入れに行っているだけだから」
[時雨]: 「それ、帰れなくなるのでは……？」
[淡雪]: 「最近はそういうの、無理に呑ませたり、付き合わせたりするのは、ダメらしいから」
reference_answer:
This is the cake I've made for tonight's Christmas party.
I wonder what dad will say about it?
I feel a strange sense of exhilaration coursing through me.
[Everyone]: 「Meowry Christmas!!Merry... Xmas.Merry Christmas!Merry Christmas♪Merry Christmas~♪Merry Christmas!!Merry Christmas!」
[Awayuki]: 「Merry Christmas!」
[Kashou]: 「Oh... Where did Dad go off to?」
Don't tell me he doesn't plan to show his face tonight?
[Awayuki]: 「Tee hee... No need to worry. He'll be back shortly.」
[Awayuki]: 「He's just going to the neighborhood association's drinking party to provide refreshments.」
[Shigure]: 「Isn't that the thing he doesn't come back home from...?」
[Awayuki]: 「As of late, it seems they're not allowed to do things like that—forcing people to drink, party along with them, things of that nature.」
ModelAnswer:
This cake was made for tonight’s Christmas party.
Father wonders what to say.
I was enveloped in a strange, fluttering excitement.
[Everyone]: “Merry Christmas! Merri… Crimely Christmas – Merry Christmas♪ Merry Christmas indeed~♪ Merry Christmas!! Merry Christmas!”
[Awayuki]: “Mery kurisumasu”
[Kashou]: “Wait... where did Father go?”
He wouldn’t even be willing to meet my eyes this time, would he?
[Awayuki]: “Hehe… don't worry about it, he’ll be back in a little while.”
[Awayuki]: “He’s just going to deliver some sake for the neighborhood drinking party.”
[Shigure]: “Is that… is he going to get stuck staying away?”
[Awayuki]: “Apparently, they’re no longer forcing people to drink or pair them up anymore these days.”

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Maple (メイプル) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Awayuki (水無月 淡雪) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Azuki (アズキ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female
Question:
[メイプル]: 「そういえば、時雨が勝手にフランスに行ったことは、ちゃんと許してもらえたの？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[シナモン]: 「ああ～、置き手紙１つだったから、お母さん怒ってましたよね～？」
[淡雪]: 「そうねー。相談もなしに急に行っちゃうものだから、心配したわー」
[時雨]: 「申し訳ありませんでした……」
[淡雪]: 「でもまぁ、嘉祥が一緒だったみたいだし」
[嘉祥]: 「俺も驚いたけどな」
[淡雪]: 「お土産のフィナンシェが美味しかったから許したわ♪」
母親は怒ると海より深く静かに怒るタイプだが、美味しい食べ物で、だいたい何でも許してくれるのだった。
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「That reminds me, did he ever forgive you for just up and going to France, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Cinnamon]: 「Aah~ You only left a letter behind, which made Mom upset, right~?」
[Awayuki]: 「That's right. She just ran off out of the blue without discussing it at all; it worried me sick.」
[Shigure]: 「I apologize for that...」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh well, it seems that you were with Kashou anyway.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, which was a surprise to me, too.」
[Awayuki]: 「The financier you gave me as a souvenir was delicious, so you're forgiven♪」
My mother is the type that when she gets angry, her anger is as deep and silent as the ocean. She forgives almost anything if you give her something tasty, though.
ModelAnswer:
[Maple]: “Speaking of which, did you really get permission from me to go to France all on your own?”
[Shigure]: “U…uh…”
[Cinnamon]: “Oh my – it was just one left note, wasn’t it? Your mother was really upset!”
[Awayuki]: “Yeah. She must have been worried because you just suddenly left without even talking to me.”
[Shigure]: “I’m sorry…”
[Awayuki]: “But… well, you seemed to be with Kyou (嘉祥), so it's alright.”
[Kashou]: “I was surprised too, you know?”
[Awayuki]: “The financiers were delicious, so I forgive you!♪”
Mother is a type who gets angry deeper and quieter than the sea, but she’ll usually forgive anything with delicious food.

metadata:
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Awayuki (水無月 淡雪) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Azuki (アズキ) | Gender: Female
[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[淡雪]: 「ええ、フランスのラ・ソレイユっていうお店の」
[嘉祥]: 「えっ、師匠の焼き菓子をお土産にしてたのか！？」
[アズキ]: 「時雨ー！？」
[時雨]: 「じ、実はキャリーケースに１箱しか入らなかったんです！」
[時雨]: 「ネコたちのぶんは、兄様が作ってくださいますよ。　そうですよね？」
[嘉祥]: 「あ……ああ……同じように作れるかなぁ……？」
[ショコラ]: 「お師匠さまのフィナンシェは、ご主人さまのと味が違うんですか？」
[嘉祥]: 「そうだな。そもそも、使っている材料も違うし」
全ての材料をフランスから取り寄せていたら、超高級店みたいな価格設定になってしまう。
reference_answer:
[Awayuki]: 「Yes, from a shop called 'La Soleil' in France.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? You gave her my mentor's baked goods as a souvenir?!」
[Azuki]: 「Shigure?!」
[Shigure]: 「Th-The truth is... I could only fit one box in my carry-on case!」
[Shigure]: 「Nii-sama will make all the catgirls's portions. Isn't that right?」
[Kashou]: 「S-Sure... Can I even make it the same, though...?」
[Chocola]: 「Is your mentor's financier different in taste than yours, Master?」
[Kashou]: 「It is. Right down to the ingredients we use.」
If I were to get all my ingredients from France, we'd have to have some super high-class patisserie prices to recoup.
ModelAnswer:
[Awayuki]: “Yes, the La Soleil shop in France.”
[Kashou]: “Wait a minute! You were bringing Master’s pastries as souvenirs?!”
[Azuki]: “Shigure!?”
[Shigure]: “J, actually, I could only fit one box in the carry-on case!”
[Shigure]: “The cats’ biscuits are made by you, Older Brother. Right?”
[Kashou]: “Ah… Oh… Could I make them myself too...?”
[Chocolat]: “Is Master’s financier different from your flavor?”
[Kashou]: “I don't know. The ingredients themselves are different.”
If I ordered all the materials from France, it would end up with a super-high-end price setting.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Awayuki (水無月 淡雪) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「わぁ、クリスマスのプレゼントですか！？ありがとうございます、母様！」
[淡雪]: 「ちょっと早いかもしれないけれど、嘉祥ってば、また怒って帰っちゃうかもしれないでしょう？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[嘉祥]: 「そ、それは今日はないから！　信用してって」
[淡雪]: 「はい、嘉祥にも」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、うん……ありがとう」
[淡雪]: 「開けてみて？」
言われるがままに、包装紙を取って小箱を開けた。
[嘉祥]: 「……写真立て？」
写真は入っていないようだ。
[淡雪]: 「今年の想い出の１枚を部屋に飾ってみたら、楽しいと思うのよ？」
そういえば、母親が欲しがっていたとかで、誕生日に時雨がプレゼントしたのを思い出す。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Wow, a Christmas present?! Thank you so much, Mother!」
[Awayuki]: 「It might be a bit early, but Kashou just might get all huffy and go back home again.」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Kashou]: 「Th-That's not happening today! C'mon, believe me!」
[Awayuki]: 「And for you, too, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, yeah... Thanks.」
[Awayuki]: 「Open it.」
I remove the wrapping paper and open the small box as instructed.
[Kashou]: 「...A picture frame?」
It doesn't have a picture in it.
[Awayuki]: 「I think it'd be fun if you'd decorate your rooms with your best memory from this past year.」
That reminds me that my mother wanted a picture frame and Shigure got her one as a birthday present.
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: “Waa, a Christmas present? Is that right!? Thank you, Mother!”
[Awayuki]: “It’s a little early, isn't it? Kashou, you might get angry and leave again.”
[Shigure]: “U… uh…”
[Kashou]: “That won’t happen today! Please trust me.”
[Awayuki]: “Yes, me too, Kashou.”
[Kashou]: “Ah, yes… thank you.”
[Awayuki]: “Open it!”
Following her words, I peeled off the wrapping paper and opened a small box.
[Kashou]: “...A photo holder?”
There’s no photograph inside.
[Awayuki]: “How about decorating the room with one of your favorite memories from this year? I think it would be fun.”
I remembered that Shigure gave her a present on her birthday, as Mother had been wanting it.

metadata:
[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Maple (メイプル) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまの！　あ、でも、どの写真が……うーん……」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、ソレイユ開店記念のときの写真にする。　ご主人さまとバニラと３人で撮ったやつ！」
[バニラ]: 「いいね。グッドチョイス。私も、そうする」
[メイプル]: 「あたしは、どうしようかしら？」
[シナモン]: 「アレがいいんじゃない～？　船で一緒に歌ったときの」
[シナモン]: 「動画だけじゃなく、写真も撮ってもらってたよね～？」
[メイプル]: 「あー。」
[メイプル]: 「……そうね。　ちょっと恥ずかしい気もするけれど」
[メイプル]: 「あれが、この１年で私にとって、一番大切な想い出だわ」
[シナモン]: 「メーちゃんの一番大切な思い出に……わたしも写って……はぁはぁ……うっ」
[メイプル]: 「え？　自分だけ写ってる写真なんだけど……？」
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「One of Master! Oh, but, which one? Hmm...」
[Chocola]: 「Oh, I'll put in the photo to commemorate the opening of La Soleil. The one with you, Master, and Chocola!」
[Vanilla]: 「Nice. Good choice. I'll do the same.」
[Maple]: 「What should I go with?」
[Cinnamon]: 「Why not that one~? You know, the one of us singing on the boat together.」
[Cinnamon]: 「They didn't just take videos; there's photos from then, too, right~?」
[Maple]: 「Aah, yeah.」
[Maple]: 「...Right. I feel like that'd be kind of embarrassing.」
[Maple]: 「But that is the most precious memory of the year to me.」
[Cinnamon]: 「I'm going to be in... May-chan's most precious memory... Hah, hah... Uhhh...」
[Maple]: 「Huh? I'm picking one with just me in it, though...」
ModelAnswer:
[Chocola]: “My master’s! Ah, but which photo… um…”
[Chocola]: “Let’s do a picture from when La Soleil opened! A photo of you and Vanilla together!”
[Vanilla]: “That’s good. A great choice. I’ll do the same.”
[Maple]: “I don't know what to do.”
[Cinnamon]: “This one is nice, isn’t it? The picture from when we sang together on the boat.”
[Cinnamon]: “Didn’t they take pictures of us too, not just the video?”
[Maple]: “Ah…”
[Maple]: “…Yeah. I feel a little embarrassed, but…”
[Maple]: “That is the most precious memory I have from this past year.”
[Cinnamon]: “Maple’s most precious memory… I’m in it too… huff huff… ugh!”
[Maple]: “Huh? It’s just a picture of me by myself…”
